live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53303.summary: Some customers in East of Winnipeg experiencing an interruption to Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53303.title: Sep 11 - Winnipeg (East) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Further issues in the area have been found.  Teams are back on site working towards a resolution.
Power has been restored and services should be restored.  We will continue to monitor.
We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.

53131.title: Sept 9 - Jasper | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
